title: Did Christine Blassie Ford claim she called a friend on a cell phone in 1982?
subtitle: The Internet trolls created a bogus story in an attempt to discredit Dr. Christine Blassie Ford's testimony.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Christine Blassie Ford claimed to have called a friend on her cell phone after Brett Cavanaugh attacked her in 1982, despite the fact that cell phones had not yet been invented.
